Row.Text: You have {2_Dignitaries} [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries and {1_Magistrates} [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates
Levy War Taxes

In this time of war, the people of our nation must rally together as one and donate their livelihoods to the cause of the nation's triumph against her foes.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May not be enacted in the Ancient Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted when at war. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold variables increase with global [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.

In this time of war, the people of our nation must rally together as one and donate their livelihoods to the cause of the nation's triumph against her foes.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Formalize Scales, Weights, and Measures

Have you ever tried converting perches to pikes, and realized along the way that you lost a number? Headaches? Sleepless nights? Not anymore! Our bureaucracy offers to formalize the weights and measures system.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Mathematics.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game.[NEWLINE]Costs:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.[NEWLINE]Rewards:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in all cities.
Compile Code of Laws

Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficient administration it would be better to codify them into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched {1_Tech}. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cost of adopting [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies reduced by 15%.

Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficient administration it would be better to codify them into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched {1_Tech}. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform Cooldown by 15%.

Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficient administration it would be better to codify them into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cost of adopting [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies reduced by 15%.

Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficient administration it would be better to codify them into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform Cooldown by 15%.
Invite Great Person to Court

There has been recent talk of a man of great skill in our lands. If only we were to impress him with our policies, we might be able to request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Tradition, Liberty, Honor, or Piety Branch. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks additional Decisions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tradition: Invite Tutor to Court. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Liberty: Invite Civil Servant to Court. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Honor: Invite Veteran to Court.

There has been recent talk of a man of great skill in our lands. If only we were to impress him with our policies, we might be able to request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Tradition, Liberty, Honor, or Piety Branch. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks additional Decisions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tradition: Invite Tutor to Court. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Liberty: Invite Civil Servant to Court. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Honor: Invite Veteran to Court. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Piety: Invite Holy Man to Court.
Invite Civil Servant to Court

There has been recent talk of a man of great administrative skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Liberty Branch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Dignitary [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Magistrate

There has been recent talk of a man of great administrative skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Dignitary [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Magistrate
Invite Holy Man to Court

There has been recent talk of a man of great theological skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Piety Branch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Doctor [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Prophet

There has been recent talk of a man of great theological skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Doctor [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Prophet
Invite Tutor to Court

There has been recent talk of a man of great academic skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Tradition Branch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Engineer [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Merchant [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Scientist

There has been recent talk of a man of great academic skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Engineer [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Merchant [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Scientist
Invite Veteran to Court

There has been recent talk of a man of great martial skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Honor Branch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admiral [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great General

There has been recent talk of a man of great martial skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed the Honor Branch. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admiral [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great General [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Scout/Explorer/Adventurer

There has been recent talk of a man of great martial skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admiral [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great General

There has been recent talk of a man of great martial skill in our lands. We should request his services for the good of the nation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Person of one of the following classes appears in the Capital: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Admiral [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great General [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great Scout/Explorer/Adventurer
Host a Grand Tournament

A benevolant ruler from time to time reminds the people of their love and admiration. So let us invite all to a great tournament and remind the people of our beneficence. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched {1_Tech} [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with the number of cities.[ENDCOLOR]

A benevolant ruler from time to time reminds the people of their love and admiration. So let us invite all to a great tournament and remind the people of our beneficence. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns.
Dispatch Emissaries

There are no doubt other leaders in this would with whom we would wish to foster peace and trade. Let us dispatch our emissaries to seek them out. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Makes contact with a random Civilization or City-State that you have not met.

There are no doubt other leaders in this would with whom we would wish to foster peace and trade. Let us dispatch our emissaries to seek them out. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Makes contact with a random Civilization or City-State that you have not met.
Appoint Chief Dignitary

A distinguished dignitary has come to our attention. We should promote them to a worthy status. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Dignitary.
A distinguished dignitary has come to our attention. We should promote them to a worthy status. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Dignitary.
Appoint Chief Magistrate

A distinguished magistrate has come to our attention. We should promote them to a worthy status. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Magistrate.
A distinguished magistrate has come to our attention. We should promote them to a worthy status. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Great Magistrate.
Hold Political Forum

We are now in a position to invite our friends of lesser nations to join us in a summit and look to the future. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched {1_Tech}. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have met at least one City-State with whom you are at least neutral. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all known City-States with whom are at least neutral. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries cost increases with every 3 City-States with whom you stand to gain [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence.

We are now in a position to invite our friends of lesser nations to join us in a summit and look to the future. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence.
{1_PlayerName} of {2_CivName} has held a political forum between themselves and the city-states of the world.
Fund Colonial Venture

We are now in a position to invite our friends of lesser nations to join us in a summit and look to the future. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Navigation. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May not be enacted after the Modern Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a {2_UnitType} with +1 [ICON_MOVES] Moves and +1 Sight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain two Naval Units.

We are now in a position to invite our friends of lesser nations to join us in a summit and look to the future. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a {1_UnitType} with +1 [ICON_MOVES] Moves and +1 Sight. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain two Naval Units.
{1_PlayerName} of {2_CivName} has invested in a new colonial venture.
Hold Military Parade

To both show the world the immense power of Autocracy and to keep our citizens in check, let us hold a military parade that is both entertaining and fearsome. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have adopted [ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY] Autocracy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a garrison in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ends [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all current Cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost is increased for every city.[ENDCOLOR]

To both show the world the immense power of Autocracy and to keep our citizens in check, let us hold a military parade that is both entertaining and fearsome. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ends [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all current Cities.
Privatize Factories

It is no business of the government to play God in the economy. We must release our grip upon the industries and pursue the Freedom of our factories. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have adopted [ICON_IDEOLOGY_FREEDOM] Freedom. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Factories. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Factories are sold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from each city. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain {2_num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production cost is increased for every Factory.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold reward is increased for every Factory.[ENDCOLOR]

It is no business of the government to play God in the economy. We must release our grip upon the industries and pursue the Freedom of our factories. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Organize Soviets

The organization of the workers of the world is at the heart of our functioning society. Let us call together the Soviet Councils of our nation and show the world that prosperity lies in Order. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have adopted [ICON_IDEOLOGY_ORDER] Order. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Workers. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Workers are expended. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all Cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost is increased for every Worker Unit.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production boost is increased for every Worker Unit, and is based upon a city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output.[ENDCOLOR]

The organization of the workers of the world is at the heart of our functioning society. Let us call together the Soviet Councils of our nation and show the world that prosperity lies in Order. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all Cities.

Replace.Text: In 1803 Napoleon of France was hard pressed for cash as he was set on a dream of European hegemony. He therefore offered the Louisiana Territory, a vast region between the Mississippi and the Rockies against a lump sum of 15 million dollars. The President and the Senate agreed and the United States nearly doubled its size.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be America. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Founded cities start with additional territory.

To please the gods, we need human sacrifices, so we will arrange Flower Wars with the smaller kingdoms around us. Captives taken in these wars shall be sacrificed to the gods, and as an added bonus, we can take this as a chance to keep those smaller kingdoms in check.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Aztecs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Civil Service. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from.

To please the gods, we need human sacrifices, so we will arrange Flower Wars with the smaller kingdoms around us. Captives taken in these wars shall be sacrificed to the gods, and as an added bonus, we can take this as a chance to keep those smaller kingdoms in check.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from.

We are many peoples, scattered and divided. Yet at the same time we are also one people; the Haudenosaunee. Ratifying the Great Law of Peace will bind the Iroquois Confederation together with a formal constitution and announce our unity to the world![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Iroquois. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities must be connected to the Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all Cities.

We are many peoples, scattered and divided. Yet at the same time we are also one people; the Haudenosaunee. Ratifying the Great Law of Peace will bind the Iroquois Confederation together with a formal constitution and announce our unity to the world![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all Cities.

We have often sent lavish gifts and embassies to the many lesser nations to show to them our might and goodwill. Let us do so again on an unprecedented scale! We shall proclaim to the world the glory of Siam, so that we might properly and permanently establish our position as the greatest empire on earth![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Siam. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must know at least 4 City-States.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be at Peace. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted between the Renaissance and the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive between +10 and +40 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all met City-States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The resting point for [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all City-States is increased by 10. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each City-State known.[ENDCOLOR]

The Comanche emerged as a distinct group shortly before 1700, when they broke off from the Shoshone people living along the upper Platte River in Wyoming. In 1680 the Comanche acquired horses from the Pueblo Indians after the Pueblo Revolt. They separated from the Shoshone after this, as the horses allowed them greater mobility in their search for better hunting grounds.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Shoshone. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes The Comanche. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Reward} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3 Comanche Riders appear near the Capital.

The Comanche emerged as a distinct group shortly before 1700, when they broke off from the Shoshone people living along the upper Platte River in Wyoming. In 1680 the Comanche acquired horses from the Pueblo Indians after the Pueblo Revolt. They separated from the Shoshone after this, as the horses allowed them greater mobility in their search for better hunting grounds.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes The Comanche. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3 Comanche Riders appear near the Capital.

Row.Text: {1_LeaderName} of the Shoshone has united the Comanche peoples into a single nation.
Comanche
Comanche Empire
The Comanche

Replace.Text: The body of St. Mark, our patron saint, has been discovered abroad. It is our sacred duty to return him to his rightful place in Venice! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Venice. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Trade Route with a City-State.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game.
